data.author: ElParking Internet
data.description: Open your Parking with your Pebble, secure, you will forget your remote and will be able to easy share your parking access. It's easy: Your mobile or smartwatch is the only thing you need to open your Parking door It's secure: ParkingDoor ensures that only you and your invited guests have access to your Parking You share: Invite a friend or whoever to open your door, always under control, with limited access based on the time slot you define You save money: Forget your old remote, its battery and so expensive copies. With ParkingDoor app you can invite any family member, tenant or friend using his email and defining the time slot you want to grant access for him. Always under control. You can revoke that permission at any time, immediately, real-time. Your guest will only need his phone to enter your parking. You will have a detailed log of all your parking opening events made by your guests. ParkingDoor will improve your life: -FOR GRANTING TEMPORAL ACCESS TO YOUR CLEANING PROVIDER With ParkingDoor you can grant temporal access to your cleaning company or any other provider. After their allowed slot they will not be able to open the door. And always under your control. -FRIENDS COMING TO THE CITY? Using ParkingDoor you will be able to grant access for them to your empty lot. You can be wherever. -GOT A TENANT? With ParkingDoor you can grant temporal access or long term access without having to let him a remote or a key, ask him for a deposit, etc. And when he leave the rental lot, he will not have access to your parking.
data.title: ParkingDoor
